text.textblock: Notice of Use Restriction_Seasonal Closure of Access Road to Simon Canyon ACEC

agency.textblock: Bureau of Land Management, Farmington District, Interior.

summary.textblock: To protect significant natural resources, a seasonal road closure is in effect each year from March 1-July 31.

supplem.textblock: The road will be closed seasonally with locked gate in T. 31 N., R. 8 W., Sec. 27; NE1/4. Access beyond this point will be limited to permitted users. Authority for the closure is found in 43 CFR part 8364. Any person who fails to comply with a closure issued under 43 CFR part 8364 may be subject to the penalties provided in 43 CFR 8360.0-7: violations are punishable by a fine not to exceed $1,000 and/or imprisonment not to exceed 12 months.
Bill Falvey, BLM Farmington District, 1235 La Plata Highway, Farmington, NM 87401. Phone (505) 599-6329.
